attributes.title: Keep yourself pure and powerful!
attributes.description:
Satsang delivered on October 12 2019

Summary: 
Paramashiva Exists! He is here in the form of Nithyananda Paramashivam to give the ultimate Paramashiva Jnana - Powerful Cognition - and Paramashiva Vijnana - Powers and other manifestations of the powerful cognitions - to all of us. Simply what Paramashiva is giving - Receive and Celebrate in your life. That's all! 

Human Being is a possibility. Either you can become God and reach Kailaasa or become devil and demon and reach Naraka - Hell. What you internalize continuously decides what you become. If you do Samskara Dahana Kriya and get rid of your strong negative patterns, then you will understand how Swamiji is empowering, enlightening and raising you to the space of Kailaasa.
